headline: GTA Online
subtitle: TOTAL PLAYER
content: Share your love of retro arcade games by opening your very own arcade. In an array of locations and each with their own quirky charm, there is something for all tastes and theyâ€™re ready to be stocked with a range of classic cabinets to play, all at your fingertips.  Purchase and refurbish the property then play while with earnings from the games and bar collect in the safe. And just through the office is the cavernous basement that could be used for planning an even riskier investment.
